alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 2:18PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist and northwestern St. Charles Parishes through 245 PM CST... At 218 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Killona, or near Reserve, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Killona, Wallace, Norco, Montz, Edgard, Taft, New Sarpy, Destrehan and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 205 and 219. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson
